publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-328 Christine May: "The Place" in Glenrothes-That the Parliament welcomes the launch of "The Place", the Glenrothes Youth and Health and Advice Service for 12 to 25 year olds; congratulates the young people of Glenrothes and its high schools who have worked with NHS Fife and Fife Council to develop the service, and calls on the Scottish Executive to look at "The Place" and encourage other towns to provide a similar service for their young people.

S2M-328 "The Place" in Glenrothes (lodged on 9 September 2003) Paul Martin*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Trish Godman*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Scott Barrie*, Cathie Craigie*, Rosie Kane*, Mike Watson*, Helen Eadie*, Maureen Macmillan*, Sarah Boyack*, Tricia Marwick*, Elaine Smith*, Bill Butler*

S2M-328 Christine May: "The Place" in Glenrothesâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the launch of "The Place", the Glenrothes Youth and Health and Advice Service for 12 to 25 year olds; congratulates the young people of Glenrothes and its high schools who have worked with NHS Fife and Fife Council to develop the service, and calls on the Scottish Executive to look at "The Place" and encourage other towns to provide a similar service for their young people. Supported by: Paul Martin, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Trish Godman, Jackie Baillie, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Scott Barrie, Cathie Craigie, Rosie Kane, Mike Watson, Helen Eadie, Maureen Macmillan, Sarah Boyack, Tricia Marwick, Elaine Smith, Bill Butler, Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-328 "The Place" in Glenrothes (lodged on 9 September 2003) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-328 "The Place" in Glenrothes (lodged on 9 September 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-328 "The Place" in Glenrothes (lodged on 9 September 2003) Marilyn Livingstone*, Dr Jean Turner*, Dr Elaine Murray*
